descriptionHtml:
Note: No further support will be provided for this modification as it is due to being merged with my High tier iron steel and hide equipment http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19051

Craftable ancient nord armor in light version ;) requires advanced smithing perk and SkyForge.
Enjoy!
Installation: just unzip .esp into data your data folder, check with launcher and you\'re ready to go!

Update 1.2
-requires advanced smithing perk to create
-can be created only at SkyForge
-armour rates same as scaled
-added support for NMM download
Update 1.1
Armor material required is now iron instead of steel. Moved armor to studded category (Thanks to TardOnPC)
All perks (beside matching set - hope sb will tell me how to do this) from light armor tree seem to be working now.
author: WarlordThorvald
